testcase.failure:
Given registered user is on home page.......................................passed When title of home page is Petco Supplies...................................passed Then user enters "prasanna.kandregula.lpk@gmail.com" and "Lucky@143" in Sign In page.passed Then user clicks on Sign In button and navigates to Home page...............passed Then user searches for an item..............................................failed Then user naviagtes to PDP by choosing specific item........................skipped Then user adds item to cart.................................................skipped Then navigates to cart page.................................................skipped And proceed to checkout.....................................................skipped Then selects second Day Delivery............................................skipped Then Enters Credit card details.............................................skipped Then verifies Place Order button enabled or not.............................skipped And places order based on availability of Place Order button................skipped
